Code: EXEC SQL SELECT VALUE(T1.NUM_ENDOSSO, 0) FROM seguros.endossos T1, SEGUROS.PARCELAS T2, SEGUROS.PARCELA_HISTORICO T3 WHERE T1.NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND T1.DATA_INIVIGENCIA <= :CB58W001.DTCANCEL AND T1.DATA_TERVIGENCIA >= :CB58W001.DTCANCEL AND T2.NUM_APOLICE = T1.NUM_APOLICE AND T2.NUM_ENDOSSO = T1.NUM_ENDOSSO AND T2.NUM_APOLICE = T3.NUM_APOLICE AND T2.NUM_ENDOSSO = T3.NUM_ENDOSSO AND T2.NUM_PARCELA = T3.NUM_PARCELA AND T2.OCORR_HISTORICO = T3.OCORR_HISTORICO AND T3.COD_OPERACAO BETWEEN 200 AND 299 WITH UR END SQL
